english.segment1: Oh, God of heaven come and hem me in. Gather the pieces that are broken. Show me the wonder of You again. Oh, God of heaven
english.segment2: God of my hope, God of my need. God of my pain that no one else will ever see. God of my healing, God of my strength. God who has always and will forever reign. God of my everything
english.segment3: In all creation You call my name. In all the beauty that this world displays. Still I'm the one for whom Your heart aches. In all creation
english.segment4: God of my hope, God of my need. God of my pain that no one else will ever see. God of my healing, God of my strength. God who has always and will forever reign. God of my everything. God of my everything
english.segment5: And when the mountains shake. You are my God, You never change. And when the earth gives way. You are still God, You never change
english.segment6: God of my hope, God of my need. God of my pain that no one else will ever see. God of my healing, God of my strength. God who has always and will forever reign. God of my everything
english.segment7: God of my everything. God of my everything. God of my everything
